charges.charge_description: 21 USC 846, 841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(A) Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute more than 1,000 kilos of marihuana (Offense Date: 3/1/92 to 3/10/92) Penalty: Life and/or $4 million fine. (1)
21 USC 846, 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A) Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute more than 1,000 kilos of marihuana (Offense Date: 3/1/92 to 3/10/92) Penalty: Life and/or $4 million fine (1s)

21 USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B) &; 18 USC 2 Possession w/intent to distribute more than 100 but less than 1000 kilos, that is approx 456 kilos of marihuana (Offense Date: 3/7/92) Penalty: 40 yrs and/or $2 million fine and 4 yrs SRT. (2)

21 USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B) &; 18 USC 2 Possession w/intent to distribute more than 100 but less than 1000 kilos of marihuana (Offense Date: 3/7/92) Penalty: 40 yrs and/or $2 million fine plus 4 yrs SRT. (2s)
